title: Great analytical-comparison to what humans are doing today
review: I loved the way they had the soldier ants vs the worker ants.It is just like that today in politics. (Our military trying to gather more $ than the civilians.)Woody Allen's comeback, as long as I don't have to see him. (Voice is okay.) I don't dislike Woody, but of late, this has more meaning than any of his projects in the 90's.Peace out, oh, and stay cool Woody........
